name: Puking Pussycats
description:
Puking Pussycats

An endless tower defense game with 4 different types of cats, 3 different enemies, and 1 goal- to save the fish! Contains a shop, 5 music choices, infinite upgrades, etc.

Submission to the Weekly Gamejam with HURL theme.

*MUST be played in fullscreen*

Updates?

The game probably is a bit buggy because of lack of playtesting. I will try fixing bugs here and there, but I will mainly be updating the downloadable version. Feel free to comment if you've encountered any errors, have any suggestions or questions or just wanna say hi. 

Creator's Experience:

In my previous game jams, I've noticed that the most crucial thing I'm missing is the strange, strange feeling called... "fun". What seemed like such a trivial and simple thing... turned out to be my downfall...so I promised to myself that the main priority will be FUN. Anyway, the first thing I thought of when I found out the "HURL" theme was cats.  I don't have a cat myself tho so I had to search some info online along with some sfx (I literally searched "cat spit sound free"). BUT, the most important thing is that I'm satisfied with what I have created and that it will haunt me in my dreams.
